FuncDef: The reset rawlink statistics command clears the statistics about RawLink packets. The reset rawlink statistics command clears the statistics about RawLink packets.
ExtraInfo: To view the statistics about RawLink packets in a specified period, you need to clear the existing statistics about RawLink packets. Then, the system starts to collect the statistics from zero. After the specified period, you can run the display rawlink statistics command to view the statistics about RawLink packets in the specified period.
